com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface ITheme

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClearTheme, GameSenseTheme, ThemeBase, ThemeMultiplexer

    public interface ITheme
    Interface representing a GUI theme (i.e. skin).
